00029 class Color {
00030     public:
00031         Color() { r() = g() = b() = a() = 0.; }
00032         Color(float, float, float, float = 1.);
00033         Color(const VecMath::Vector<4> &);
00034 
00035         float &r() { return RGBA[0]; }  
00036         float &g() { return RGBA[1]; }  
00037         float &b() { return RGBA[2]; }  
00038         float &a() { return RGBA[3]; }  
00039 
00041         operator float *() { return RGBA; }
00042         Color operator *=(float);
00043         Color operator *=(const Color &);
00044         Color operator *(float);
00045         Color operator *(const Color &);
00046         Color operator +=(float);
00047         Color operator +(float);
00048         Color operator +=(const Color &);
00049         Color operator +(const Color &);
00050         void setComponentLowerLimit(float);
00051         void setComponentUpperLimit(float);
00052 
00053         operator std::string() const {
00054             std::ostringstream o;
00055             o <<"[ "<< RGBA[0] << ", "<< RGBA[1]<< ", "<< RGBA[2]<< " ]"
00056               << std::ends;
00057             return o.str();
00058         }
00059 
00060     private:
00061         float RGBA[4];  
00062 };

00069 inline Color::Color(float _r, float _g, float _b, float _a) {
00070     r() = _r;
00071     g() = _g;
00072     b() = _b;
00073     a() = _a;
00074 }
00075 
00076 inline Color::Color(const VecMath::Vector<4> &x) {
00077     r() = x[0];
00078     g() = x[1];
00079     b() = x[2];
00080     a() = x[3];
00081 }

00085 inline Color Color::operator *=(float x) {
00086     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00087         RGBA[i] *= x;
00088         if (RGBA[i] > 1.) RGBA[i] = 1.;
00089         if (RGBA[i] < 0.) RGBA[i] = 0.;
00090     }
00091     return *this;
00092 }
00093

00098         RGBA[i] *= x.RGBA[i];

00101         if (RGBA[i] < 0.) RGBA[i] = 0.;
00102 #endif
00103     }
00104     return *this;
00105 }

00161 inline void Color::setComponentLowerLimit(float l) {
00162     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) if (RGBA[i] < l) RGBA[i] = l;
00163 }
00164 
00167 inline void Color::setComponentUpperLimit(float u) {
00168     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) if (RGBA[i] > u) RGBA[i] = u;
